showScoreExcerpt:
"O'Hara can sing the phone book and I'll be entranced. Looking as lovely as ever, she does spellbinding things with a voice that moves from register to register as easily as eating ice cream...Will Chase makes a suitably fatuous but handsomely romantic lead, providing acting and singing talents that make the most of numbers like 'Where Is the Life that Late I Led?'â€¦Dancing wizard Corbin Bleu shows off his rat-a-tap-tap (even upside down!) and other terpsichorean skills."
